column4: hello, any suggestions on fixing sound in gutsy on an acer laptop with realtek alc883
btw my sound worked in dapper
First thing I'd do is check volume controls. I installed gutsy, my PCM was muted so I didn't get any sound. Sounds stupid, but it's a quick fix if that's the case
Did you just check the icon in your task bar, or did you open it? It only shows PCM mute in the full window
